title.label: Best designed game I‚Äôve seen in Years

content.label: This game has amazing music, graphics, and humor. However, the best thing about it is the actual gameplay. It‚Äôs easy to start playing but there is a ton of complexity if you want to master the game. The combat is amazing because it incorporates strategy while still being intuitive and fun. It doesn‚Äôt have the problem many similar games have where the minions are to easy and the boss is too hard, you are never guaranteed to win. The loot system with skills and blessing is very easy to understand and actually impacts your gameplay much more than other games. While there are consequences when you fail they are never overwhelming and only encourage me to play more. The only problem I‚Äôve seen is that later on in the game the enemies don‚Äôt improve quite as much as you do and the rewards don‚Äôt get as big as I expected. Overall this is a amazing game and I love playing it
Where.... is.... an... UPDATE????? Or at least a sequel. Give me MOOORRREEE!!!!

This is a wonderful card based game. Great on the iPhone or iPad. Witty and sarcastic narration keeps you hooked. The beginning is very easy, but gets hard kind of quick if you don‚Äôt learn how to equip for the environment. Top down view of dungeon you build with cards and stock with encounters and loot.

title.label: Terrible game based on luck alone.

content.label: Watch your heroes die because you picked the wrong one and had no way of knowing hey were wrong. A tired waste of time.

title.label: Quirky and fun- more expansions coming?

content.label: I keep hoping for more expansions or a sequel.
I played through this over a year ago and recently reloaded it to play again.  This is a unique game with a gameplay loop that I am looking for.  Please make a sequel to this!
This is a rather fun game with tons of potential. Totally abandoned and no help or support.
There‚Äôs only a few good gamer games for phone, this is one of them. Card dungeon is good too

The core idea is original and deserves five stars. This is a dungeon delve where you drive a hero towards plunder via a simple building mechanic and then fight monsters with cards. 

Does it work? Yes. And I had a blast playing it. But there needs to be more interesting cards and advancements as the game continues. I‚Äôd also like to see an increase in interesting ‚Äúbase‚Äù enhancements.
The gameplay is not compatible with my screen, leaving margins around. And there is a invalid texture error notification in the game, which is quite annoying.
Just the right length. Fun play. Challenging, but not frustrating. Good sense of humor. Thank for the game!
Really enjoying this game. Lots of fun. Great challenge but not incredibly difficult.
Get the game. Just. Get. It.

I love the state of the game right now but it could be even better if we support the developers they are already making free content updates and it‚Äôs nice so I think you should get the game and it would also help the developers
I wish I could get my money back. Deleted.
This is a great game when I was able to play it, but out of nowhere, I‚Äôm getting text errors and can‚Äôt delete old saves. Please fix!

title.label: Very entertaining, a lot of replay value.

content.label: If they offered more dlc, I'd buy it.

Awesome game! If you want a stupid easy game, this isn‚Äôt your game... but for games that do NOT have in app purchases, I think this is one of the best, if not the best roguelike rpg game that‚Äôs out there in phone game world. It‚Äôs so much fun figuring out all the cards and gear and all the Dungeoneers.
You don‚Äôt ever want to start over.  Maybe if you spend hours reading blogs you can make it through one time ... maybe.  Total beat down.

5 stars for novelty, 3 stars for fun, 4 for mechanics, 2 for castle improvement costs/benefits.  It has roguelike elements, but replaying a level is not unique, so best to beat everything on first run.  Best strategies become clear quickly though, which is good for winning on first runs, but bad for entertainment. Improving your castle(?) is expensive and not very meaningful: with a good strategy, you‚Äôll be better off with the right 50g upgrades than many 2000g upgrades.  Worse, many 2000g upgrades will hurt a good strategy (true, a new strategy will open up, but it will not likely be better than a good strat for cheap upgrades). Maybe the upgrades would seem cheaper if one farmed, but there are only 3-ish mob-types per area  (maybe 5 if you count different versions‚Äîweak, strong, stronger‚Äîof the same mob), and each area has several levels. This monotony make farming out of the question for me--that and the incentive to upgrade is minor. I love roguelikes and dungeon crawlers, but I can only play this one for 5-15 minutes or so per day (1-2 dungeons) before I feel like Sisyphus (and, again, I'm only rarely actually replaying levels, they just all feel the same).  It's an expensive game for this level of entertainment.

This is an awesome and fun game. I like to play D&D, it would be nice to have some of these maps for export to play paper and pen games for people like me who can‚Äôt draw. I strongly suggest download this game and indulge into creating the dungeons. Love the pirates!

This game is great but how do I battle? So In the tutorial it does it for you and the first battle I did not know how to battle I‚Äôm hoping I will get a developer to respond to me and tell me how to battleüò≠üò≠
This game is so fun you can build your on guild and fight in dungeons, there SO MANY THINGS YOU CAN DO IN MY OPINION!

There‚Äôs NO tutorial. Good luck figuring out how to play this game. Add on top of that the insanely difficult learning curve. I‚Äôve died repeatedly for hours making no progress.

Too bad. This game had potential. Moving on.
Really fun game and a great value.  A little more in the way of instructions wouldn‚Äôt hurt.

I‚Äôve downloaded tons of games and never felt compelled to write a review until now.  This game just keeps me coming back.  The simple gameplay but deep strategy just doesn‚Äôt let go.  Very clever and intuitive interface with cute characters and hilarious voiceover poems.  A bit grindy at times, but always leaving me wondering how to approach a level differently to squeeze out a win and unlock more cards.  This game is super fun.  Highly recommended.

I love this game. It‚Äôs easy to pick up, fun to play, and full of charm. It‚Äôs a great feeling to unlock a new class, but it leads to one thing that needs changing:  the new classes make the older classes obsolete. Once you get into the third (or even second, really) tier classes, you don‚Äôt need to use anyone else. It might be fun to have certain dungeons that require a specific class or genre to keep the player on their toes.  Chumps and Mimes need quests too!
A great game that‚Äôs lots of fun with the right amount of difficulty.

I‚Äôve had the game for five days and I‚Äôve probably racked up about 20 hours of game time.  I find it really fun!  Sometimes the cards don‚Äôt go your way, but accepting that Dungeoneers die is just part of the learning experience.  Use your Chumps to scout out dungeons and see what kind of monsters you‚Äôll face before committing your better people, and you can save a lot of (non-Chump) lives.  Love the game, worth the money!

title.label: Really 3.5 stars, but I rounded up

content.label: I think this falls into not a bad game, but not really great either. I‚Äôd say the presentation is 4 stars, gameplay 3. The biggest problem is the lack of variety. Classes are all very similar. Monsters are all very similar. Quests are practically the same in each dungeon. There are dozens of dungeons with different names but they might as well be the same one over and over again. Also RNG is quite strong in the game, particularly in the early levels when you don‚Äôt have that many good characters to choose from. You either draw the right cards or you don‚Äôt. Not much strategy or deck building to it. Once you get better characters the RNG isn‚Äôt as big a factor but the game gets boring fast at that point. Once I got the Grail Knight I pretty much never lost a fight after that. I could force myself to play a lesser character to make it more of a challenge, but the challenge is again all in whether you draw the right cards. To sum up, fun for a little while as you learn the game, but no longevity.
It‚Äôs easy to play, with challenge.

Overall the game is fantastic. It reminds me of a munchkin game that I used to play, but without the unnecessary burden of ‚Äúother people‚Äù or ‚Äúfriends‚Äù (god I‚Äôm so lonely.) 
The graphics are pretty good for what they are trying to do, as the art is simple, but has a lot of detail. 
Gameplay is fun and very humorous, but can be kind of grindy.
Soundtrack is amazing, has great music and voiceover. 
Best thing, no ads or in app purchases being shoved down my throat. 
Great job overall guys, keep it up!
Laying out the dungeon and the round-by-round combat are both fun little puzzles. Not too challenging, but enough to keep busy.

I download games all the time and if it doesn't catch my "Fun zone" right away, it gets deleted. 

I've been playing this game for several hours now because it's captured me!
Please update for iPhone X , everything is so small.

The choices are bizarre, I get to make the dungeon, but not retain the equipment or experience they receive between crawls.  Still, it‚Äôs humor and layout is refreshing.

Bit twitchy lately, the loot cards don‚Äôt appear sometimes after defeating an enemy so I don‚Äôt know the effect of the choices I could make.  But otherwise, a cute game I am enjoying.

title.label: This is a must have game

content.label: An interesting game that will keep you entertained for about 10 hours

Overall, fun game, good session-by-session deck building concept. Enemy types were varied enough to stay interesting, synergies were fun and simple to put together.
My one complaint is that I never needed to use most classes. Some were just so much better than the others (lookin‚Äô at you, artificer) that it felt like handicapping myself if I chose anyone else, and too easy is I chose that one. I had something in the neighborhood of 30 dungeons complete on a single character by the time I got to the end of the game, and I thought it was a little ridiculous that I was able to do so on a single character.
Frustrated by the fact that the website for the developer doesn‚Äôt work. Also that data cannot be shared amongst iOS devices. Despite this, fun game.
It looks fun, and it sounds fun, but the game is simply unplayable on my iPhone 6 without a magnifying glass.  The fonts used are so small that are unreadable.  How do I get a refund?
Really good game play with the perfect amount of grinding/advancing in difficulty. Awesome strategy too

I really enjoy this game. It has just the right mix of strategy and luck to make it exciting with the use of cards. The different classes and types of gear also add a clever build fun to plan out your characters. But do not get attached to your characters. They will die! 

Also the humor of the game will make any gamer that played pen and paper and computer game rpgs laugh.

title.label: Really hard to read on iPhone XS

content.label:
I left it at 3 stars because I have no idea if the game is good or not. Compared to just about every game or app on the apple store, this one hurts my eyes to look at even a little. 

The text and game details are so fine, it‚Äôs obvious it was designed for tablets or something similar. This review might get buried, but I hope it helps someone.

Bought this game originally in my pc. Spend hours playing and decided to look for the app. Great port! 

Game plays well. Basically enter a dungeon, build it up per turn based on what the goal is and place your enemies(not including bosses) to level up. 

Great and simple game. Only reason i pulled it down a star was due to lack of any for of long-standing leveling. Each dungeon you start at level one and level within the dungeon.
Error 1009 at battle card/check texture validity
Well written game. Haven't played it very far yet but so far get nice. Would be a lot better with iPhone X and XS support.

title.label: A really great game! -1 star for many bugs. -1 star for no iCloud

content.label: A really, truly excellent game! But I am running into many many bugs. Also there is for no iCloud integration so I can‚Äôt pick up a game from another device, which is a must for a game like this.
Simple mechanics, subtle strategy and silly songs. Great fun for old school RPGers.

title.label: Great Game! Please Update to XS Max full screen!

content.label: I love card rpg games. Add a bit of roguelike elements. You have a winner! HAVING A BLAST!
Recommend it
